channel.title: pages on Will-Ellwood.com
channel.description: Recent content in pages on Will-Ellwood.com

item.title: Now
item.description: As of September 23rd 2019: I have just moved to Aberdeen, Scotland I am looking to spend a lot more time writing prose and code for myself I am still listening to a lot of Earth

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Will. I wear many hats, but these are some of the things that I do: Write code Do things with Linux Play games Brew coffee Drink beer Take photographs, mostly of cats

item.title: Talks
item.description: Upcoming Talks Past Talks [DevOps Notts]() August 21st 2019 Held at Rebel Recruiters, Nottingham. A talk and demonstration of Test Driven Infrastructure development using Molecule to control Docker, Ansible, TestInfra, and an assortment of linting tools. Tech Nottingham July 9th 2018 Held at Antenna, Nottingham 18:30. Everything is terrible. How can we change that? In this talk we will discuss how speculative fiction magazines can publish fiction & articles to a global audience in a way that is accountable to their readers.
